db:abstract.db:para: Contains classes from the Qt3DAnimation module.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractAnimation
db:section.db:para: An abstract base class for Qt3D animations.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractAnimationClip
db:section.db:para: QAbstractAnimationClip is the base class for types providing key frame animation data.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractClipAnimator
db:section.db:para: QAbstractClipAnimator is the base class for types providing animation playback capabilities.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractClipBlendNode
db:section.db:para: QAbstractClipBlendNode is the base class for types used to construct animation blend trees.

db:section.db:title: class QAdditiveClipBlend
db:section.db:para: Performs an additive blend of two animation clips based on an additive factor.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationAspect
db:section.db:para: Provides key-frame animation capabilities to Qt 3D.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationCallback
db:section.db:para: Represents an animation callback object.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationClip
db:section.db:para: Specifies key frame animation data.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationClipData
db:section.db:para: Class containing the animation data.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationClipLoader
db:section.db:para: Enables loading key frame animation data from a file.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationController
db:section.db:para: A controller class for animations.

db:section.db:title: class QAnimationGroup
db:section.db:para: A class grouping animations together.

db:section.db:title: class QBlendedClipAnimator
db:section.db:para: QBlendedClipAnimator is a component providing animation playback capabilities of a tree of blend nodes.

db:section.db:title: class QCallbackMapping
db:section.db:para: Allows to map the channels within the clip onto an invocation of a callback object.

db:section.db:title: class QChannel
db:section.db:para: Defines a channel for a QAnimationClipData. The animation system interpolates each channel component independently except in the case the QChannel is called "Rotation" (case sensitive), it has four QChannelComponents and the same number of keyframes for each QChannelComponent. In that case the interpolation will be performed using SLERP.

db:section.db:title: class QChannelMapper
db:section.db:para: Allows to map the channels within the clip onto properties of objects in the application.

db:section.db:title: class QChannelMapping
db:section.db:para: Allows to map the channels within the clip onto properties of objects in the application.

db:section.db:title: class QClipAnimator
db:section.db:para: QClipAnimator is a component providing simple animation playback capabilities.

db:section.db:title: class QClipBlendValue
db:section.db:para: Class used for including a clip in a blend tree.

db:section.db:title: class QKeyFrame
db:section.db:para: A base class for handling keyframes.

db:section.db:title: class QKeyframeAnimation
db:section.db:para: A class implementing simple keyframe animation to a QTransform.

db:section.db:title: class QLerpClipBlend
db:section.db:para: Performs a linear interpolation of two animation clips based on a normalized factor.

db:section.db:title: class QMorphTarget
db:section.db:para: A class providing morph targets to blend-shape animation.

db:section.db:title: class QMorphingAnimation
db:section.db:para: A class implementing blend-shape morphing animation.

db:section.db:title: class QVertexBlendAnimation
db:section.db:para: A class implementing vertex-blend morphing animation.
